verses.verse: מִכְתָּ֥ם <WH4387> Michtam לְדָוִ֑ד <WH1732> of David שָֽׁמְרֵ֥נִי <WH8104> Preserve אֵ֝֗ל <WH410> me O God כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for חָסִ֥יתִי <WH2620> for in thee do I put my trust בָֽךְ׃

אָמַ֣רְתְּ <WH559> [O my soul] thou hast said לַֽ֭יהוָה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> Thou [art] my Lord אָ֑תָּה <WH859> you ט֝וֹבָתִ֗י <WH2896> my goodness בַּל־ <WH1077> have no עָלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5921> besides

לִ֭קְדוֹשִׁים <WH6918> [But] to the saints אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בָּאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> [are] in the earth הֵ֑מָּה <WH1992> that וְ֝אַדִּירֵ֗י <WH117> and [to] the excellent כָּל־ <WH3605> is all חֶפְצִי־ <WH2656> in whom [is] all my delight בָֽם׃

יִרְבּ֥וּ <WH7235> shall be multiplied עַצְּבוֹתָם֮ <WH6094> Their sorrows אַחֵ֪ר <WH312> [after] another מָ֫הָ֥רוּ <WH4116> [that] hasten בַּל־ <WH1077> nor אַסִּ֣יךְ <WH5258> will I not offer נִסְכֵּיהֶ֣ם <WH5262> [god] their drink offerings מִדָּ֑ם <WH1818> of blood וּֽבַל־ <WH1077> Nor אֶשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> take up אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁ֝מוֹתָ֗ם <WH8034> their names עַל־ <WH5921> upon שְׂפָתָֽי׃ <WH8193> into my lips

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> The LORD מְנָת־ <WH4490> [is] the portion חֶלְקִ֥י <WH2506> of mine inheritance וְכוֹסִ֑י <WH3563> and of my cup אַ֝תָּ֗ה <WH859> You תּוֹמִ֥יךְ <WH8551> thou maintainest גּוֹרָלִֽי׃ <WH1486> my lot

חֲבָלִ֣ים <WH2256> The lines נָֽפְלוּ־ <WH5307> are fallen לִ֭י בַּנְּעִמִ֑ים <WH5273> unto me in pleasant אַף־ <WH637> Indeed נַ֝חֲלָ֗ת <WH5159> heritage שָֽׁפְרָ֥ה <WH8231> [places] yea I have a goodly עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> and

אֲבָרֵ֗ךְ <WH1288> I will bless אֶת־ <WH853> יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who יְעָצָ֑נִי <WH3289> who hath given me counsel אַף־ <WH637> Indeed לֵ֝יל֗וֹת <WH3915> me in the night seasons יִסְּר֥וּנִי <WH3256> also instruct כִלְיוֹתָֽי׃ <WH3629> my reins

שִׁוִּ֬יתִי <WH7737> I have set יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD לְנֶגְדִּ֣י <WH5048> before תָמִ֑יד <WH8548> always כִּ֥י <WH3588> Because מִֽ֝ימִינִ֗י <WH3225> before me because [he is] at my right hand בַּל־ <WH1077> lest אֶמּֽוֹט׃ <WH4131> I shall not be moved

לָכֵ֤ן ׀ <WH3651> Therefore שָׂמַ֣ח <WH8055> is glad לִ֭בִּי <WH3820> Therefore my heart וַיָּ֣גֶל <WH1523> rejoiceth כְּבוֹדִ֑י <WH3519> and my glory אַף־ <WH637> also בְּ֝שָׂרִ֗י <WH1320> my flesh יִשְׁכֹּ֥ן <WH7931> also shall rest לָבֶֽטַח׃ <WH983> in hope

כִּ֤י ׀ <WH3588> for לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor תַעֲזֹ֣ב <WH5800> For thou wilt not leave נַפְשִׁ֣י <WH5315> my soul לִשְׁא֑וֹל <WH7585> in hell לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor תִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> neither wilt thou suffer חֲ֝סִידְךָ֗ <WH2623> thine Holy One לִרְא֥וֹת <WH7200> to see שָֽׁחַת׃ <WH7845> corruption

תּֽוֹדִיעֵנִי֮ <WH3045> Thou wilt shew אֹ֤רַח <WH734> me the path חַ֫יִּ֥ים <WH2416> of life שֹׂ֣בַע <WH7648> [is] fulness שְׂ֭מָחוֹת <WH8057> of joy אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> in thy presence נְעִמ֖וֹת <WH5273> [there are] pleasures בִּימִינְךָ֣ <WH3225> at thy right hand נֶֽצַח׃ <WH5331> for evermore
